item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Bernard M. Baruch
item.description: "Be who you are and say what you feel, because those who mind don't matter, and those who matter don't mind." -- Bernard M. Baruch

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Gordon A. Eadie
item.description: "If you don't stand for something you will fall for anything." -- Gordon A. Eadie

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "There are only two ways to live your life. One is as though nothing is a miracle. The other is as though everything is a miracle." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Mahatma Gandhi
item.description: "Live as if you were to die tomorrow. Learn as if you were to live forever." -- Mahatma Gandhi

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "The fool doth think he is wise, but the wise man knows himself to be a fool." -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Dr. Seuss
item.description: "Don't cry because it's over, smile because it happened." -- Dr. Seuss

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Keith Richards
item.description: "If you're going to kick authority in the teeth, you might as well use two feet." -- Keith Richards

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Dylan Thomas
item.description: "Somebody's boring me. I think it's me." -- Dylan Thomas

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Three Days Grace
item.description: "And now your dead inside, still you wonder why, when your on the edge and falling off, its all over, for you" -- Three Days Grace

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Sheryl Crow
item.description: "It's not having what you want, it's wanting what you have!" -- Sheryl Crow

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Anne McCaffrey
item.description: "Who wills, Can. Who tries, Does. Who loves, Lives." -- Anne McCaffrey

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Albert Camus
item.description: "Don't walk behind me; I may not lead. Don't walk in front of me; I may not follow. Just walk beside me and be my friend." -- Albert Camus

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Edgar Allan Poe
item.description: "I became insane, with long intervals of horrible sanity." -- Edgar Allan Poe

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "Without music, life would be a mistake." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Tite Kubo
item.description: "Do you know why the big brother is born first? It’s to protect the little brothers and sisters that come after him. A brother telling his sister, "I’ll kill you"... You never, ever say something like that." -- Tite Kubo

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by G.K. Chesterton
item.description: "Poets have been mysteriously silent on the subject of cheese." -- G.K. Chesterton

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by George Orwell
item.description: "It's a beautiful thing, the destruction of words." -- George Orwell

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Spike Milligan
item.description: "Money can't buy you friends, but you do get a better class of enemy. " -- Spike Milligan

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Albert Einstein
item.description: "Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe." -- Albert Einstein

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Friendship is born at that moment when one man says to another: "What! You too? I thought that no one but myself . . .&#34;" -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Yann Martel
item.description: "If we, citizens, do not support our artists, then we sacrifice our imagination on the altar of crude reality and we end up believing in nothing and having worthless dreams." -- Yann Martel

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by James Patterson
item.description: "WARNING If you dare to read this story, you become part of the Experiment" -- James Patterson

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Tom Clancy
item.description: "The difference between fiction and reality? Fiction has to make sense." -- Tom Clancy

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Garrison Keillor
item.description: "I believe in looking reality straight in the eye and denying it. " -- Garrison Keillor

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by George Harrison
item.description: "If you don't know where you're going, any road'll take you there" -- George Harrison

item.title: Bluemoon add a quote by Oliver James
item.description: "why are trying so hard to fit in, when you're born to stand out" -- Oliver James
